Got a promo code and looking for a place to enter it? Here:Enter your promocode here Want to reduce your payments? You can cut down on your Pipedrive subscription payments by recommending Pipedrive to your friends. You earn their first month\'s payment as credit on your account.
For every transaction, customers get the equivalent points value you set.
Customers buy a specific item for a number of times you set, before they get their next purchase free.
Customers spend to increase their chances in the draw. For every spend, customers get communicated via SMS their total spend.
How many must the customer buy to get 1 item for free?
Stamp programs are ideal for items you can give away for free after a customer buys the item a number of times.
After reaching the spending goal, the customer is rewarded with the item.

This is the start of your conversation with a Loystar Care Agent.
Your list of Customers will appear here. If you already have a list, tap the refresh button to display it. Otherwise start adding customers.
Happy Birthday [CUSTOMER_NAME]. Thank you for being a loyal customer. We appreciate you. From all of us here at %1$s.
Dear [CUSTOMER_NAME], you have now spent [TOTAL_SPEND]. Spend more to increase your chances of winning.
Happy Birthday [CUSTOMER_NAME]. Please visit %1$s today and redeem [BIRTHDAY_OFFER]. Thank you :)

Your Messages have been queued for immediate delivery. Thank You.
Sorry! amount spend cannot be zero.
Every sale brings your customer back
The simplest way to sell your products/services and market to your customers to keep them coming back.
Motivate your customers to come back using loyalty programs that gives them reward points every time you sell. You do the selling, we bring the customers back.
Celebrate their birthdays with a message from you & an offer if you choose. Best of all, you don’t have to track the dates. Loystar takes care of it.
It’s never been easier to boost sales on slow days, announce new products & services or invite your customers back with a discount for a festive season.
Designed to be simple, Loystar puts all these powerful features at your fingertips and you can see the effect of your efforts in weekly and monthly reports.
